languages.text: "Изучение запретного — часть моей работы. Я проявлю большую осмотрительность, чем Эмелина. В противном случае меня ждет та же судьба".
"Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."
languages.original_text: "Изучение запретного — часть моей работы. Я проявлю большую осмотрительность, чем Эмелина. В противном случае меня ждет та же судьба".

traits.locale_text: "Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “研究禁忌的内容是我工作的一部分。我会比艾米莉娜更加谨慎，否则我也会落得同样的下场。”
languages.original_text: "Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."

traits.locale_text: “研究禁忌的内容是我工作的一部分。我会比艾米莉娜更加谨慎，否则我也会落得同样的下场。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Estudiar lo prohibido es parte de mi trabajo. Tendré más cuidado que Emelina para evitar su mismo destino».
languages.original_text: "Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."

traits.locale_text: «Estudiar lo prohibido es parte de mi trabajo. Tendré más cuidado que Emelina para evitar su mismo destino».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「禁止された物を研究するのも我の仕事の一部です。我はエメリナさん以上に慎重に対処しましょう。さもなければ、我も同じ運命をたどることになりますからね」
languages.original_text: "Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."

traits.locale_text: 「禁止された物を研究するのも我の仕事の一部です。我はエメリナさん以上に慎重に対処しましょう。さもなければ、我も同じ運命をたどることになりますからね」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Étudier ce qui est interdit fait partie de mon travail. Je serai bien plus prudent qu'Emelina, sous peine de connaître le même sort. »
languages.original_text: "Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."

traits.locale_text: « Étudier ce qui est interdit fait partie de mon travail. Je serai bien plus prudent qu'Emelina, sous peine de connaître le même sort. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das Verbotene zu studieren, ist Teil meiner Arbeit. Ich werde mehr Vorsicht walten lassen als Emelina oder anderenfalls dasselbe Schicksal erleiden."
languages.original_text: "Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."

traits.locale_text: "Das Verbotene zu studieren, ist Teil meiner Arbeit. Ich werde mehr Vorsicht walten lassen als Emelina oder anderenfalls dasselbe Schicksal erleiden."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yasaklı şeyler üzerinde çalışmak, işimin bir parçası. Emelina'dan daha temkinli davranacağım. Aksi hâlde ben de aynı akıbete uğrarım."
languages.original_text: "Studying the forbidden is part of my work. I will show greater caution than Emelina did, or else I will suffer the same fate."

traits.locale_text: "Yasaklı şeyler üzerinde çalışmak işimin bir parçasıdır. Emelina'dan daha temkinli davranacağım yoksa aynı akıbete ben de uğrarım."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
